name: Frogs Go Boing
description:
Frogs Go Boing is a relaxing and casual platform frog inspired game where you can collect stars and flies and shoot enemies with fire flies and shoot your tongue to swing along the platform. The goal is to get all 6/6 stars within the levels and get medals based on how many stars you can collect.

So far I have created 3 levels, Level 1 (shooting only), Level 2 (grappling hook only) and Level 3 (Both shooting and grappling)

I  hope to make more levels within the future

Controls

UpWLeftARightDShootSpace BarGrappling HookClickHomeEsc

KNOWN ISSUES:

On level 2 & 3 if you fall off the screen and get to zero hearts, the life count goes into minus numbers and cannot die from falling off.

Please fill out this feedback form to help me make the game better: https://forms.gle/QUiDghD3rXhq3fuU6

By Kay Cleghorn
